name: Tensor
description:
You wake up at 3 AM to an alarm blaring in your house, only to be met with a shadowy figure outside your bedroom door. Why is that there?

Created for the WWU Game Design Club's Winter 2020 Game Jam! Created in 36 hours by a team of 5 people.

Controls

WASD - Move

Move mouse - Camera

E/Enter/Left Click - Interact
